hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:"There are three, all of whom have a promise of help from Allah: 'The Mujahid who strives in the cause of Allah, the Mighty and Sublime; the man who gets married, seeking to keep himself chaste; and the slave who has a contract of manumission and wants to buy his freedom

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الرَّوْحَةِ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ .
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of Going Out After Noon In The Cause Of Allah, The Mighty And Sublime
